title: Army, Air Force to provide security for fuel bowsers and trains
body_lines: Minister of Power and Energy Kanchana Wijesekara says that the Sri Lanka Air Force (SLAF) will provide security to trains transporting fuel and the Sri Lanka Army (SLA) will provide security to fuel bowsers, if and when necessary.
The minister had earlier assured safety for fuel bowsers and fuel trains while also requesting the public to cooperate in the island-wide supply of fuel.
